knimeNode.name: Avro to Spark
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a Spark RDD from given Avro file.

fullDescription.intro:
Creates a Spark RDD from given Avro file.
Notice: This feature requires at least Spark 1.5.
fullDescription.option: Upload bundled driver or depend on cluster side provided driver.

ports.inPort: A HDFS compatible connection to the remote cluster (HDFS, WebHDFS or HttpFS)
Optional Spark context. If not connected a context is created based on the settings in the Spark preferences page.
